_description: Configuration for cyclic peptide binder design

target.chain_explanation: Chain ID of the target protein to bind

interface.cutoff_explanation: Distance cutoff in Angstroms for interface contact calculation
interface.hotspot_explanation: Target residues to focus binding (e.g., '1-5,10,15-20') or null for any

alphafold.recycle_explanation: AF2 recycles for better structure prediction (0 for speed)

optimization.optimization_explanation: Design iterations, gradient steps, and convergence check interval

loss_weights.weights_explanation: i_pae: interface PAE, i_con: interface contacts, others as in sequence design

convergence.threshold_explanation: Loss value below which design is considered converged

quality_thresholds.threshold_explanation: Quality metrics for interface regions (i_ prefix)
